member.name: T:CoordinateSharp.Celestial
member.summary: The main class for handling location based celestial information.
member.remarks: This class can calculate various pieces of solar and lunar data, based on location and date

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a Celestial based on a location and specified date

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.LoadCelestial(CoordinateSharp.Coordinate)
member.summary: Creates a Celestial based on a location and date in the provided Coordinate.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.Celestial_LocalTime(CoordinateSharp.Coordinate,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts Celestial values to local times.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.SunAltitude
member.summary: Sun altitude in degrees (E of N).

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.SunAzimuth
member.summary: Sun azimuth in degrees (E of N).

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.MoonAltitude
member.summary: Moon altitude in degrees (corrected for parallax and refraction).

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.MoonAzimuth
member.summary: Moon azimuth in degrees (E of N).

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.MoonDistance
member.summary: Estimated moon distance from the earth.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.SunCondition
member.summary: Sun's Condition based on the provided date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.MoonCondition
member.summary: Moon's condition based on the provided date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.IsSunUp
member.summary: Determine if the sun is currently up, based on sunset and sunrise time at the provided location and date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.IsMoonUp
member.summary: Determine if the moon is currently up, based on moonset and moonrise time at the provided location and date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.MoonIllum
member.summary: Moon ilumination details based on the provided date.
member.remarks: Contains phase, phase name, fraction and angle

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.Perigee
member.summary: Moons perigee details based on the provided date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.Apogee
member.summary: Moons apogee details based on the provided date.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.AdditionalSolarTimes
member.summary: Additional solar event times based on the provided date and location.
member.remarks: Contains civil and nautical dawn and dusk times.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.AstrologicalSigns
member.summary: Astrological signs based on the provided date.
member.remarks: Contains zodiac, moon sign and moon name during full moon events

member.summary: Calculates all celestial data. Coordinates will notify as changes occur

member.summary: Calculate celestial data based on lat/long and date.

member.summary: Calculate sun data based on lat/long and date.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Celestial.CalculateMoonData(System.Double,System.Double,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculate moon data based on lat/long and date.

member.summary: Returns a List containing solar eclipse data for the century. Century return is based on the date passed.

member.summary: Returns a List containing solar eclipse data for the century. Century return is based on the date passed.

member.name: T:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate
member.summary: Observable class for handling all location based information. This is the main class for CoordinateSharp.
member.remarks: All information should be pulled from this class to include celestial information

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor
member.remarks: Values will need to be provided to latitude/longitude CoordinateParts manually

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an empty Coordinate with custom datum.
member.remarks: Values will need to be provided to latitude/longitude CoordinateParts manually

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Creates a populated Coordinate based on decimal (signed degrees) formated latitude and longitude.
member.remarks: Geodate will default to 1/1/1900 GMT until provided

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates a populated Coordinate object with an assigned GeoDate.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(CoordinateSharp.EagerLoad)
member.summary: Creates an empty Coordinates object with specificied eager loading options.
member.remarks: Values will need to be provided to latitude/longitude manually

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,CoordinateSharp.EagerLoad)
member.summary: Creates a populated Coordinate object with specified eager loading options.
member.remarks: Geodate will default to 1/1/1900 GMT until provided

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double,System.DateTime,CoordinateSharp.EagerLoad)
member.summary: Creates a populated Coordinate object with specified eager load options and an assigned GeoDate.
member.param: DateTime you wish to use for celestial calculation

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.GeoDate
member.summary: Date used to calculate celestial information
member.remarks: Assumes all times are in UTC

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.ECEF
member.summary: Earth Centered Earth Fixed Coordinate. Uses Ellipsoidal height with no geoid model included. 0 = Mean Sea Level based on the provided Datum.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.Parse_Format
member.summary: Used to determine what format the coordinate was parsed from. Will equal "None" if Coordinate was not initialzed via a TryParse() method.

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.CelestialInfo
member.summary: Celestial information based on the objects location and geographic UTC date.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.LoadCelestialInfo
member.summary: Initialize celestial information (required if eager loading is turned off).

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.LoadUTM_MGRS_Info
member.summary: Initialize UTM and MGRS information (required if eager loading is turned off).

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.LoadCartesianInfo
member.summary: Initialize cartesian information (required if eager loading is turned off).

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.LoadECEFInfo
member.summary: Initialize ECEF information (required if eager loading is turned off).

member.name: P:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.Display
member.remarks: Bind to this property when MVVM patterns used

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.ToString(CoordinateSharp.CoordinateFormatOptions)
member.summary: Overridden Coordinate ToString() method that accepts formatting. Refer to documentation for coordinate format options.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.Set_Datum(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Set a custom datum for coordinate conversions and distance calculation. Objects must be loaded prior to setting if EagerLoading is turned off or else the items Datum won't be set. Use overload if EagerLoading options are used.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.Coordinate.Set_Datum(System.Double,System.Double,CoordinateSharp.Coordinate_Datum)
member.summary: Set a custom datum for coordinate conversions and distance calculation for specified coordinate formats only. Objects must be loaded prior to setting if EagerLoading is turned off.

member.summary: Returns a Distance object based on the current and specified coordinate (Haversine / Spherical Earth).

member.summary: Returns a Distance object based on the current and specified coordinate and specified earth shape.

member.summary: Move coordinate based on provided bearing and distance (in meters).

member.summary: Move coordinate based on provided target coordinate and distance (in meters).

member.summary: Geo Fence class. It helps to check if points/coordinates are inside a polygon, Next to a polyline, and counting...

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.Point})
member.summary: Prepare GeoFence with a list of points

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{CoordinateSharp.Coordinate})
member.summary: Prepare Geofence with a list of coordinates

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.IsPointInPolygon(CoordinateSharp.Coordinate)
member.summary: The function will return true if the point x,y is inside the polygon, or false if it is not. If the point is exactly on the edge of the polygon, then the function may return true or false.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.IsPointInRangeOfLine(CoordinateSharp.Coordinate,System.Double)
member.summary: The function will return true if the point x,y is next the given range of the polyline, or false if it is not.

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.IsPointInRangeOfLine(CoordinateSharp.Coordinate,CoordinateSharp.Distance)
member.summary: The function will return true if the point x,y is next the given range of the polyline, or false if it is not.
member.param: The range is a distance object

member.name: T:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.Point
member.summary: This class is a help class to simplify GeoFence calculus

member.name: M:CoordinateSharp.GeoFence.Point.#ctor(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Initialize point with defined Latitude and Longitude
